column4: is it possible to assign the mp3 filetype to xmms instead of xine? when i play music in xine it freezes the window, and i have to reboot to get control of my soundcard back
and my girlfriend just double clicked this song and now i can't close it
so what youwant to do is to right click on an mp3 icon and set the default from there
so you can set the default with open with other application
